title: Ebro In The Morning - Katt Williams On Kevin Hart Verzuz, Norm Macdonald, Emmy Win + New Tour
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Katt Williams sits down with Ebro in the Morning to discuss a variety of topics including his thoughts on Cancel Culture, winning an Emmy, Norm Macdonald's passing, how he dealt with life during the pandemic, his past legal issues and more. He also shared some advice for comedians today, as well as cleared up comments about wanting a Verzuz against Kevin Hart. You can watch him live on the 'World War III' Tour! For more info visit Ticketmaster! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
